comment.author: 95912590@N00
comment._content: Thanks for uploading this - I love to see librarians appreciating good literature. Just wanted to let you know I used it on my blog here: hiringlibrarians.com/2012/03/25/rejection-is-hard-but-oft...

comment.author: 32605636@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/flemmily] Thanks so much for letting us know how you have used this photograph! We're bi supporters of reading here at the State Library of Queensland, and enjoying many programs to encourage people to read more as part of the National Year of Reading.
